original: The bow draws its power from Aetherius itself, channeling it through the sun.
string: この弓は太陽を通じてエセリウスの力そのものを取り出し、矢に込める

original: Therefore, when an arrow is loosed from the bow, it produces a magical effect very similar to being burned by fire.
string: 放たれる矢には魔力が宿り、当ったものは炎に包まれたようになる

original: What can you tell me about Auriel's Bow?
string: アーリエルの弓について何か知らないか？

original: The bow was said to be carried by Auri-El himself into battle against the forces of Lorkhan in ancient and mythic times.
string: この弓は、神話時代にアーリエルがロルカーンとの戦いで使ったものだと伝えられている

original: Its craftsmanship has no equal anywhere within Tamriel and possibly beyond.
string: タムリエルどころか、どこの世界にも比類するものがない技術で造られたものだ

original: Are you all right?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: I think so. And thanks for asking.
string: そうですわね。聞いて下さってありがとう

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何だ？

original: Fine, don't worry about it. When we get in, you won't have to babysit about me any more.
string: いいですわ、気にしないで。いったん中に入れば、わたしの事を手取り足取り気にかけなくてもよろしいですから

original: I know your friends would probably want to kill everything in here. I'm hoping you can show some more control than that.
string: あなたのお仲間はここの住人を皆殺しにしたがるのでしょうね。あなたにはもう少し話が通じると思いたいですわ

original: Once we're inside, just keep quiet for a bit. Let me take the lead.
string: 中に入ったら、しばらく大人しくしていて。段取りはわたしが

original: I just need to be alone. For a while. There's a lot of feelings wrapped up in this old place, and I don't think you're quite ready for them.
string: しばらく独りでいたいだけですわ。ここには昔からの想いが色々と眠っていて、それらにつき合わせるにはまだ早い気がするのです

original: So let me take the lead in there.
string: だから中ではわたしにお任せを

original: I think...
string: わたしは…

original: It's not about you! You've been so great in getting me back here.
string: あなたのせいではございませんのよ！ ここに連れ戻してもらって大いに感謝していますわ

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: I wanted to thank you for getting me this far. But after we get in there, I'm going to go my own way for a while.
string: ここまで連れて来てくれてありがとう。でも中に入ったら、わたしはしばらく自分の道を進む事にいたしますわ

original: Hey, so... before we go in there...
string: 中に入る前に言っておきたい事があるのですが…

original: Umm... this is the part where we usually get in the boat. You with me?
string: うーん… 普通ならボートに乗るところですわね。ついて来ますの？

original: That's it, out there to the north. We used to keep a boat around here to get there and back.
string: そうですわ、北に行ったところですの。そこまで行って戻ってくるためのボートを、わたし達はこの辺りに確保しておきましたのよ

original: I guess we should head towards your family's home, then.
string: そちらの家族の住む家に向かうとしよう

original: Glad you're finally listening. Come on, let's move.
string: お分かり頂けたようですわね。さあ、急ぎましょう

original: I don't see you with any better ideas.
string: もっとマシな案がありそうには思えないが

original: Excuse me? I told you we should go to my family's home.
string: もし？ わたしの家族の住処を目指すべきだとお伝えしましたわよね？

original: Maybe you're finally ready to list to me.
string: ようやく耳を貸す気になったのかしら

original: What a wonderful place you've brought me.
string: 何て素敵な場所なのでしょう

original: So this is where your Vigilants came from? No wonder you look so lost all the time.
string: となると、ここがあなた達番人の本拠ですの？ あなたがいつも途方に暮れたような顔してるのも無理ありませんわね

original: Even in this weather, it's better than the cave.
string: こんな天気でも、洞窟の中よりはましですわ

original: This weather is incredible.
string: この天気、信じられませんわ

original: Ah, it's so good to breathe again!
string: ああ、また息ができるなんて素晴らしいですわ！

original: Is... everything all right here?
string: その… ここは大丈夫ですの？

original: Something's not right here. Be careful. I think we may be in for some trouble.
string: ここはどうも変ですわね。気を付けて。面倒な事になったようですわ

original: Keep your eyes open, here.
string: ここは用心なさって

original: Stay on your guard.
string: 油断禁物ですわよ

original: Did you hear something?
string: 何か聞こえて？

original: I don't like the look of this...
string: 見た感じが気に入りませんわ…

original: Oh wow. This is gorgeous.
string: はわぁ… すごく豪華ですわね

original: I'm glad you're here with me.
string: あなたが一緒にいてくれて嬉しいですわ

original: I'll remember this.
string: この事は忘れませんわ

original: It's like from the stories I used to hear... the two adventurers seeing the world.
string: 昔によく聞いた物語みたい… 二人の冒険者が世界中を旅しますのよ

original: I never knew it would be this beautiful.
string: こんなにも美しいとは存じませんでしたわ

original: Are you seeing this? It's fantastic!
string: ご覧になって？ 素敵ですわよ！

original: This is the kind of thing I've been wanting to see.
string: こんな光景を見たいと思っておりましたの

original: Makes everything else worth it.
string: 来た甲斐がありましたわ

original: Never saw anything like this back on the island.
string: 島ではこんなのを見た事もありませんでしたのよ

original: It... almost doesn't even look real. You know?
string: とても… この世のものとは思えませんわ

original: By the blood...
string: ああ、ご先祖様…

original: This feels like the right way. I was starting to worry.
string: こちらで正解ですわね。一時はどうなる事かと思いましたわ

original: So I'm thinking that wasn't the right way.
string: ですから、道を間違えたのではないかと思っておりますの

original: All right, so obviously not this way, either.
string: いいですわ。この道でもない事は明らかですわね

original: Well, we're definitely not going to find our way out from here.
string: もし、これではいつまでたってもここから出る道は見つかりませんわよ

original: Do you... know what you're doing?
string: あなた… 目算はありまして？

original: Any idea how to get out of here?
string: ここから出る方法は？

original: Your guess is as good as mine. This place looks pretty different from when I was locked away.
string: わたしにもよく分かりませんわ。幽閉されていた頃からずいぶんと印象が変わっていますのよ

original: It'll be good to get out of the sun for a while.
string: しばらく陽光から逃れるのもいいですわね

original: Good, let's get inside there. The sun is starting to get to me.
string: よかった。中に入りましょう。もう陽の光がそこまで来ていますわ

original: Another cave. I've spent enough time underground, myself, but if you want to go in, I'm right behind you.
string: また洞窟ですの？ 地下にはもう飽き飽きしていますけど、あなたがどうしてもと言うなら仕方がありませんわね、お供いたしますわ

original: Nordic ruins. Even older than I am. I wonder if the draugr are as gullible as they were when I was a girl.
string: ノルドの遺跡ですわね。わたしの歳よりも古い場所。今でもドラウグルはわたしの子供の頃と同じくらいノロマなのかしら

original: Is this a dwarven city? I can't believe they'd let it get so run down.
string: これがドワーフの都市？ こんなに荒れ放題なんて信じられませんわ…

original: I always wondered what the dwarves actually looked like. I hear they're like elves, but with beards.
string: ドワーフの実物はどんなふうなんだろうとずっと思っておりましたの。エルフに似てるけど、ヒゲを生やしてるんですって

original: So this is the grand tour of Skyrim's caves that you're showing me?
string: すると、これはスカイリムの洞窟巡りという事？

original: Arkay, we're going to need your help more than ever.
string: アーケイ、これまでにないほど、あなたの力が必要になりそう

original: Watch your back.
string: 背後に気をつけろ

original: Keep your eyes open.
string: 気を抜くなよ

original: Stay alert.
string: 注意を怠るな

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Take care of yourself.
string: 気をつけて行け

original: Fight bravely, friend.
string: 戦いは勇敢であれ

original: Arkay bless you, friend.
string: アーケイの祝福があらん事を

original: We'll speak again soon.
string: また会おう

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: Mmm hmm.
string: はいはい

original: Don't get yourself killed!
string: 殺されるのを待ってちゃダメ！

original: See you.
string: またね

original: Keep your neck covered!
string: 喉笛をさらさないように！

original: Take care.
string: 気を付けて

original: Bring the Dawnguard honor.
string: ドーンガードに名誉を

original: Fight well.
string: 奮闘に期待する

original: May your blades stay sharp.
string: 刃が鋭くあらん事を

original: Stay vigilant, friend.
string: ステンダールの加護あれ

original: Divines guide you.
string: 神々の導きがあらん事を

original: May you always prevail.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈るわ

original: Keep your guard up.
string: 気を抜かない事ね

original: I'll be seeing you.
string: また会いましょう

original: We're all that stands between Skyrim and disaster.
string: スカイリムを破滅から救うのは我々だけだ

original: We'll stop them, whatever it is they're up to...
string: 奴らの企みが何であれ、止めてみせるわ…

original: Have to put a stop to this menace...
string: 奴らの脅威を食い止めねば…

original: I hear you're doing a lot of the work in tracking down these vampires. If there's anything I can do to help, let me know.
string: 吸血鬼達の追跡にずいぶん活躍しているらしいわね。何か手伝える事があれば知らせてちょうだい

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: You go ahead. I'll talk to Isran in a minute.
string: 入ってくれ。すぐイスランに取り次ぐから

original: I heard what's going on. The vampires, the Dawnguard, all of it. I wanted to help, so here I am.
string: 吸血鬼やドーンガードの事を聞いてね。矢も盾もたまらなくなって押し掛けたんだ。それでここにいるってわけさ

original: Okay, let's head into the portal.
string: いいですわ、それでは転移門に入りましょう

original: I'm ready to go when you are.
string: わたくしはいつでもよくてよ

original: I know this isn't an easy choice. Take your time.
string: おいそれと決められる話ではありませんわね。じっくり考えるのがよろしくてよ

original: I'm ready when you are.
string: 準備はできておりますわ

original: All right, here we go.
string: いいですわ、行きましょう

original: Just get all of the ingredients into the vessel.
string: 材料をぜんぶ器に入れて下さいまし

original: They shouldn't be that hard to find. Shelves, tables... should be easy to find. She wouldn't have hidden them.
string: そんなに苦労するはずはありませんわ。棚やテーブルを探せば簡単に見つかると思いますの。母は隠さなかったでしょうから

original: I remember she use to keep a small journal. See if you can dig it up.
string: そういえば母は小さな日記をつけておりましたわ。見つかりますかしら

original: Turns out my mother was sneakier than I thought. I wonder what she's hiding?
string: 母は思ったよりも隠し事をなさる人でしたのね。一体何をしまいこんでいたのかしら？

original: Look around for the missing crests. Even in this mess, they should stick out.
string: なくなっているクレストを探しますのよ。これだけ散らかっていても、あれは目立つはずですわ

original: The moondial definitely wasn't like this the last time I saw it.
string: この月時計は絶対こんなふうではありませんでしたわ、わたくしが最後に見た時には

original: I can't wait to see the courtyard again.
string: 中庭をもう一度見る時が待ちきれませんわ

original: You'd better get out of here and get yourself cured.
string: こんな所にいないで、治療を受けに行った方がいいわよ

original: You're lucky Isran hasn't killed you outright. Get cured while you can.
string: イスランにとどめを刺されずにすんで幸運だったな。早く治療した方がいい

original: Find Sorine and Gunmar, and maybe we can do something about this mess.
string: ソリーヌとガンマーを見つけてくれ。そうすればこのひどい状況も好転するだろう

original: The Vigilants of Stendarr, in over their heads. What a surprise.
string: ステンダールの番人が手をこまねいている。これは驚きだな

original: I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で会おう

original: We were hoping Isran would be of help. That now seems unlikely.
string: イスランが助けてくれるかも知れないと思ったんだけど。今となっては、望みは薄いわ

original: Even if he won't help the Vigilants, he could at least offer us shelter for the moment.
string: 番人の手助けはしないとしても、少しの間、安全な場所に入れてくれたっていいのに

original: Never expected so blatant an attack by vampires, of all creatures.
string: まさか、よりによって吸血鬼が、こんなに派手に襲ってくるとは思わなかった

original: Without the Hall, the Vigilants need a new rallying point.
string: 番人の間を失った番人達には、新たな拠点が必要だ

original: Isran, of all people. We're reduced to asking him for help.
string: あのイスランに助けを求めるしかないなんてな

original: We knew Isran was working on something, but we had no idea he'd found this place.
string: イスランが何かを推し進めているのは分かっていたが、あんな場所を見つけたとは初耳だった

original: If Isran hadn't left the Order, this could've been our home.
string: イスランが教団から抜けていなければ、ここが家になっていたかも知れない

original: I guess I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で会う事になりそうね

original: What would mudcrabs want with my satchel, anyway?
string: マッドクラブが私のカバンを盗んで、何をどうするっていうの？

original: Just one gyro. One, and I can get back to work. Where are they?
string: ジャイロ1個でいいのよ。1個あれば、仕事に戻れるのに。どこにあるのかしら？

original: I knew it was a matter of time before the vampires would come for us.
string: 吸血鬼らに狙われるのは時間の問題だと分かっていた

original: Mind yourself. There's a vicious bear on the loose.
string: 気をつけろ、凶悪なクマがうろついてる

original: Feed well.
string: よく食べなさい

original: Enjoy your hunt.
string: 良い狩りを

original: Bleed Skyrim dry.
string: スカイリムの血を吸いつくすのよ

original: May mortals quake at your approach.
string: 君が近づけば定命の者達は震え上がるだろう

original: Until next time.
string: ではまた

original: Ancestors guide you.
string: 先人の導きあれ

original: Enjoy yourself.
string: 楽しんでこい

original: If you'll excuse me.
string: では失礼する

original: Follow your instincts.
string: 本能に従うんだ

original: Revel in your power.
string: 自分の力を満喫したまえ

original: I look forward to our next meeting.
string: 次に会うのを楽しみにしてるよ

original: Thank you. I'll be going.
string: ありがとう。もう行くよ

original: Good hunting.
string: 良い狩りを

original: Darkness shroud you.
string: 闇に包まれん事を

original: Feast on life, friend.
string: 人生を楽しみなさい

original: Woah!
string: きゃあ！

original: I think that might have been what we were waiting for.
string: まるでわたし達が訪れるのを待っていたように思えますわね

original: Let's head back up there and see if we can read the scrolls.
string: あそこに戻って、書が読めるかどうか確かめましょう

original: How many more?
string: 残りいくつだろうか？

original: Well, unless my vision's playing tricks, there seems to be some sort of magical effect around you. Seems like we're on the right track.
string: 幻惑でも見ていない限り、あなたの周りに魔法の効果のようなものが見えますわ。やり方は間違っていなかったようですわね

original: Otherwise, I don't have the faintest idea.
string: もし間違いでもしていたら、これからどうするのかお手上げでしたわ

original: Damn moths! Why are they doing that?
string: どうして蚕が寄ってくるんだ？

original: Ha ha. They seem quite taken to you now that you're carrying some of the tree bark.
string: ふふっ。あなたが木の皮を持っているから、蚕達があなたに頬を染めてますわ

original: I guess we should have seen this coming... Moth Priest, moths... they're apparently related in some way.
string: この事は予測しておくべきでしたわね… 聖蚕の僧侶、蚕… 明らかに何らかの関係がありますわよ

original: Couldn't hurt to gather more I suppose.
string: もっと集めても多分大丈夫ですわ

original: Got any ideas about the knife?
string: ナイフはどうすればいい？

original: Well, if I were a betting woman, I'd say it's a scraper of some sort.
string: 憶測でも構わないのでしたら、多分それはヘラか何かのようなものでしたわ

original: Mother had something similar back home when she was tending the courtyard gardens to scrape moss and fungus off of the trees.
string: うちに似たようなものがありましたわね。母が中庭の庭園でコケやキノコを木からはがすのに使っておりましたの

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵でしたけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうでしたわ

original: Well, if I were a betting woman, I'd say it's a scraper of some sort.
string: 憶測でもよければ、多分それはヘラか何かみたいなものね

original: Mother had something similar back home when she was tending the courtyard gardens to scrape moss and fungus off of the trees.
string: うちに似たようなやつがあったわ。母が中庭の庭園でコケやキノコを木からはがすのに使ってたの

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵だったけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうだったわね

original: What do I do with the knife?
string: ナイフはどうすれば？

original: Wow.
string: わあぁ…

original: Look at this place. No one's been here in centuries.
string: ご覧になって。何世紀というもの、誰一人訪れなかった場所ですわよ

original: I doubt there's any other place like it in Skyrim. It's beautiful.
string: スカイリムに二つとない場所だわ。なんて美しいのかしら

original: Are you... Did you get infected?
string: まさか…感染したのか？

original: Gods, don't let Isran see you like that. Look, I hear Falion in Morthal deals with this kind of thing. Go see him immediately.
string: イスランにその姿を見られるなよ。モーサルにいるファリオンが処置の仕方を知っていると聞いた。今すぐ訪ねるべきだ

original: Otherwise, you're a threat to all of us.
string: さもないと、我々全員の脅威となる

original: By the Divines... you're infected. What are you doing here?
string: 大変だわ… 感染してるじゃない。ここで何してるの？

original: You get yourself to Morthal at once. Speak with Falion. He'll help you. But go do it now.
string: すぐにモーサルに向かって、ファリオンと話しなさい。助けてくれるわ。でも急いでね

original: Otherwise, you're a threat to all of us.
string: さもないと、我々全員の脅威になる

original: Oh, look at you. What've you done? You've gone and gotten yourself turned into one of them.
string: なんてザマだ。何をやったんだ？ 吸血鬼殺しが吸血鬼になったわけか

original: Well Arkay isn't going to intervene... not here, not now. Best point yourself towards Morthal, find a man named Falion.
string: アーケイは手を出すつもりはない… 今、ここではな。モーサルへ向かって、そこでファリオンという男を探すといい

original: He can help you. Go now, please, before you lose control of yourself.
string: 彼が力になってくれるはずだ。早く行ってくれ。理性が残ってるうちに

original: How dare you set foot in here, after being infected by those foul beasts?
string: あの忌々しい獣どもに汚（けが）されたあとで、よくもここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな

original: I ought to cut you to pieces right where you stand...
string: そこから動くなよ。バラバラに切り刻んでやる…

original: I'll give you a chance to redeem yourself. Go to Morthal and speak to Falion. He can help you. Otherwise you're dead to me.
string: だがお前にチャンスをやろう。モーサルに行ってファリオンに会え。彼なら力を貸してくれるだろう。さもなければお前は死人も同然だ

original: Get out of here, monster.
string: バケモノめ、ここから去れ

original: Get yourself cured immediately. You're a threat to all of us otherwise.
string: 即刻に治療をすべきだ。さもなくば我々全員の脅威となってしまう

original: You're not welcome here as long as you're one of those... monsters.
string: ここにいてはいけないわ。今のあなたは… 怪物なのよ

original: You need to get cured, friend. You're a danger to the Dawnguard otherwise.
string: 治療を受けるべきだ。そのままじゃ、ドーンガードにとっても危険だ

original: I can't believe it. You're one of them... Talk to Isran. Maybe he can help you. Please, I don't want to have to kill you.
string: 信じられない。奴らの仲間じゃないか… とにかくイスランと話すんだ。たぶん力になってくれる。早くしろ、あんたを殺したくない

original: You really don't look well. Have you talked to Florentius? Maybe he can help you.
string: 相当具合が悪そうだけど、フロレンティウスに話してみた？ 彼なら力になってくれるわよ

original: I think perhaps you should speak to Isran. You don't look... well.
string: イスランと話した方がいいぞ。なんだか具合が悪そうだ

original: Are you infected? Keep your distance from me.
string: 感染してるのか？ だったら近づくな

original: We don't need competition for blood, and we don't want the mortals getting up in arms making things difficult for us.
string: 血の獲得競争は必要ない、そして定命の者達がいきり立って状況を困難にする事も望ましくない

original: Go destroy the feral beast before this becomes a problem.
string: これが問題になる前に、野蛮な獣達を殺してきなさい

original: Needless to say, we can't abide that, as it would raise general alarm amongst the herd, to say nothing of the increased feeding competition.
string: かの者が広く民衆に不安を引き起こしているのをこれ以上看過はできない。このままでは捕食の競争も激化する事になる

original: You are to destroy the feral creature before this small problem becomes a larger one.
string: この小さな問題が大きくなるまでに、野蛮な生物を殺すのだ

original: Now what?
string: これからどうする？

original: The effect around you looks an awful lot like that huge column of light shining on the dais.
string: あなたの周りに見える魔法の効果は、まぶしい大きな光の柱のようですわね

original: Let's check that out.
string: 調べてみましょう

original: Fortune smile upon you, milady!
string: 奥様、ご幸運を！

original: Fortune smile upon you, milord!
string: 旦那様、ご幸運を！

original: Good luck. I hope you find the answers you seek.
string: 幸運を祈るよ。答えが見つかるといいな

original: I've helped you all that I can. The rest is up to you.
string: できるだけ手は貸したつもりだ。あとは君次第だよ

original: Yes, milady? What can I help you with?
string: はい、奥様。ご用は何ですか？

original: Yes, milord? What can I help you with?
string: はい、旦那様。ご用は何ですか？

original: The scrolls gave me its exact location.
string: 星霜の書が正確な位置を教えてくれた

original: Then let's get going. I want to get there before my father has a chance to track us down.
string: では急ぎましょう。父に見つかる前にそこへ行かなければ

original: It's in a place called Darkfall Cave.
string: ダークフォール洞窟と呼ばれる場所にある

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally put an end to this ridiculous prophecy.
string: となれば、もうほとんど終わりですわね。このバカげた予言にようやくピリオドを打てるのかしら

original: Where is this "Darkfall Cave?"
string: その“ダークフォール洞窟”はどこにありますの？

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally rewrite the prophecy as we see fit.
string: となれば、ほぼ終わったようなものですわ。予言をいい方向に書き変える事がようやくできますのね

original: Where is this "Darkfall Cave?"
string: その“ダークフォール洞窟”はどこにあるの？

original: What about Auriel's Bow? Do you know where we can find it?
string: アーリエルの弓は？ どこに行けば見つかるのかしら？

original: Never mind that... it worked!
string: おっと… うまくいったみたいだ！

original: After everything we've been through, it had damn well better work.
string: ずいぶん大変な思いをしたのですから、うまくいってもらわないと困りますわ

original: That felt strange.
string: 妙な感覚だった…

original: I could see it in your eyes. You looked about a thousand leagues away.
string: 目を見れば分かりますわ。あなたはずっと遠くにいるように見えましてよ

original: Don't worry, I'm fine.
string: 心配ない、大丈夫だ

original: I never trusted those damn scrolls. Who knows what those things could have done to you... just look at Dexion.
string: あの下らない書を信じた事などございませんわ。あんなものに関わるとろくな目に遭わないですわよ… デキソンがいい例ですわ

original: That was interesting.
string: 興味深い体験だった…

original: Are you okay? Almost thought I lost you there... you went white as the snow.
string: 大丈夫ですの？ あそこであなたが死んでしまうのかと思いましてよ… 雪みたいに白くなってしまったものですから

original: Talk to Isran. He'll decide if he wants you for the Dawnguard.
string: イスランと話せ。ドーンガードに必要な人材かどうかは彼が判断する

original: Isran's inside the fort. He's the one you need to talk to.
string: イスランは砦の中だ。彼に直談判するといい

original: Glad you decided to give it a try. I hope Isran likes you.
string: 試してみる気になってくれて嬉しい。イスランに気に入られるといいな

original: If you're here to join up, you need to see Isran. He's up at the fort talking to some Vigilant.
string: 仲間になりたくて来ているなら、イスランに会うんだ。砦で番人らしき奴と話している

original: Want my advice? Never welch on a bargain with the Ideal Masters... they don't take it very well.
string: いいこと教えてやろうか？ アイディール・マスターとの約束は破らない方がいい… 彼らの機嫌を損ねることになる

original: This place tears at me as though I'm still alive and being drawn and quartered. I... can't stand it anymore.
string: この場所は苦しみばかり。まるでまだ生きていて、体を引き裂かれるような… これ以上は耐えられない

original: That's the last time I argue with a dremora.
string: ドレモラと言い争いになったのは、あれが最後だな

original: Madness. It was madness to attack that coven of witches! Why didn't they listen to me?
string: イカれてる。魔女の集団に攻撃をかけるなんて！ どうして注意を聞かないんだ？

original: Why can't I just die? I fear I'm cursed to walk this desolate land forever.
string: どうして死ねないんだ？ この何もない場所をさまよい続ける呪いなんて嫌だ

original: Did you know I visited Elswyr once? What a strange and wondrous place.
string: エルスウィーアに行ったことがあるって話したか？ 奇妙で驚くほど凄い所だったな

original: I yearn to see the great dunes of Hammerfell once again.
string: ハンマーフェルの砂丘を、もう一度この目で見てみたいな

original: No one ever escapes. There is no escape. Why would you even try?
string: 誰も逃げたりしないな。逃げ道なんかないからな。やるだけ無駄じゃないか？

original: Death is but a door, time is but a window. I'll be back.
string: 死は扉にすぎず、時は窓にすぎない。また来るよ

original: Shhh. They're watching us. Always watching.
string: シー。彼らが見てる。いつも見張ってるんだ

original: A soul gem... that's what it was. Then... I must be... Oh, no.
string: 魂石… あれがそうだとしたら、じゃあ… 私は… ああ、どうしよう

original: I can't remember how long I've been here. Has it been a day or a century?
string: いつからここにいるのか思い出せない。もう1日経った？ それとも1世紀？

original: What day is it? What year? What era even?
string: 今日は何日？ 何年？ というか第何紀なんだ？

original: The screams... they pierce my mind. I can't stand it!
string: あの叫び声… 心を引き裂くようだ。耐えられない！

original: All I said to Potema was I thought she looked a little portly in that gown. How was I supposed to know?
string: ポテマには、そのドレスだと少し太って見えると言っただけさ。だって知らなかったからね

original: Are you alive? I must be imagining this.
string: 生きてる人？ きっと幻覚だな

original: Emptiness consumes me.
string: 虚無感に押しつぶされそうだ

original: Must stay away from the Keepers... must stay away from the Keepers.
string: 番人に近づいてはダメだ… 番人に近づいてはダメだ

original: "Just step into the painting" he said. Yeah, sure... like it's that simple.
string: 彼の言う通り、「絵の中に入っただけ」。そうよ… 簡単で素敵だと思ったのよ

original: I wonder if the fires are still burning in the Imperial City...
string: 帝都の火はまだ燃えてるのかしら？

original: I must return to the frontline Alessian headquarters at once... lives are hanging in the balance!
string: すぐに前線のアレッシア司令部に戻らないと… 人々の命が危ないんだ！

original: Damn Akaviri Shaman... how could I know it would trap my soul?
string: 忌々しいアカヴィリの呪術師… まさか、魂を捕らえられるなんて！

original: How could they trick me like this? I was one of Reman's court wizards!
string: あんな奴らに騙されるとは思わなかった。レマンの王宮魔術師である、この私が！

original: I live in a dark world, where no light shines through. I carry this burden with every step I take.
string: ここは光の差さない、暗闇の世界だ。一歩一歩が、この苦しみと共にある

original: Only those who have suffered long can find the light within the shadows.
string: 長く苦しんだ者だけが、暗闇の中で光を見つけることができる

original: This accursed place is nothing but a prison without walls.
string: この呪われた場所は、まるで壁のない牢獄だ

original: Stay away from the Oblivion Gate I told them. Did they listen? Of course not.
string: オブリビオンの門に近づいてはいけないと言ったけど、彼らが聞くわけないだろ？

original: How dare they cast me from the Battlespire! I will make them pay dearly.
string: バトルスパイアーからこんな所に飛ばすなんて！ 必ず復讐してやる

original: That sky... it feels like I'm being watched. Can't stand it anymore!
string: あの空… なんだか、ずっと見張られてるみたいだ。もう耐えられない！

original: My ship... what happened to my ship? Where am I?
string: 船は… 私の船はどこ？ ここは一体どこなんだ？

original: I miss the warm sunshine. Green grass. Blue skies. I miss being alive.
string: 暖かい陽の光や、緑の草原や、青い空が恋しいな。生きてた頃に戻りたい

original: I wonder if my family misses me? I wonder if they're still alive. How much time has passed?
string: 家族は心配してるかな？ それ以前に、生きてるのかな。一体どれほどの時間が経ったんだ？

original: I no longer hunger, grow weary or feel anything but loneliness.
string: お腹も減らないし、疲れもしないし、何も感じない。孤独以外はな

original: One moment I'm raising a sword against that necromancer, the next moment I found myself here. What happened?
string: あの死霊術師に向かって剣を振り上げた、次の瞬間にはここにいた。一体どうなってるんだ？

original: At least the pain is gone...
string: 少なくとも、苦痛はもう感じない…

original: The clouds, the sky... it's all wrong. Everything's wrong.
string: あの雲も、空も… 何もかも、全部がおかしい

original: What am I doing here? I don't belong in a place like this!
string: なぜここにいるんだ？ こんな所、私にはふさわしくない！

original: So this is what it's like on the other side.
string: 世界の裏側って、こんな感じなのか

original: One thousand steps and a thousand more...
string: 千歩進んで、そこからまた千歩…

original: I thought death was a release, not an eternity of torment.
string: 死は解放だと思ってたのに、実際は永遠の苦しみだった

original: Beware the dragon Durnehviir, destroyer of souls and harbinger of the fallen.
string: ドラゴンに気をつけて。魂を破壊し、滅びをもたらすわ

original: Stay away from the crystals or you may find yourself becoming one of us.
string: 水晶に近づいてはダメだ。こんな姿になりたくないならね

original: This is no place for you.
string: ここはあなたの来る場所じゃない

original: Get out while you can.
string: 逃げられるうちに、ここを離れるんだな

original: There's no escape.
string: 逃げ道なんてないぞ

original: Leave me be.
string: 放っといてくれ

original: What a horrible place.
string: なんてひどい場所だ

original: Is there no end to this nightmare?
string: この悪夢に終わりはあるのか？

original: Please... end this misery.
string: 頼む… ひと思いに楽にして

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: Isran is the only one trying to do something about these vampires.
string: 吸血鬼をどうにかしようとしているのはイスランだけよ

original: I don't much like him, but I can't allow the people of Skyrim to be preyed upon by those monsters.
string: 彼の事はあまり好きじゃないけど、スカイリムの仲間が怪物達の餌食にされるのを黙って見てるわけにはいかないわ

original: Not a lot of our kind here, I see. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 同族はあまりいないわね。驚く事でもないけど

original: Still, those of us here have as much of an obligation to protect Skyrim as any other, wouldn't you agree?
string: でも、ここのみんなと同じようにスカイリムを守る義務があるわ。そうでしょ？

original: Seems that I'm the only of my kind here. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 種族うちでここにいるのは私だけみたいね。別に驚く事でもないけど

original: Still, it's my duty to help protect Skyrim as much as any Nord's, don't you think?
string: それでも他のノルド達と同じように、私にもスカイリムの防衛に協力する義務があるわ。そう思わない？

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: I lost two wives to vampires. I will avenge them.
string: 吸血鬼には妻を二人も奪われた。仇はとる

original: It is good to know that I will not have to do it alone. I am glad this Dawnguard exists.
string: 独りでやらなくていいのはありがたい。ドーンガードがいてよかった

original: You've worked with Isran before?
string: 以前にもイスランと組んだことが？

original: I have. There was a time, years ago, when we were both members of the Vigilants, and both equally dissatisfied with them.
string: あるとも。以前は二人とも番人のメンバーだったからな。途中で嫌気がさしたのも一緒さ

original: Their hearts are in the right place, of course. But Isran and I were never comfortable.
string: もちろん連中は至ってまともなんだが、イスランと俺には水が合わなくてね

original: We left together, but that partnership didn't last very long. I didn't agree with some of his methods.
string: で、一緒に脱退したものの、コンビは長続きしなかった。方向性の違いって奴だよ

original: Isran found something for you to do, eh? I thought he'd like you. Good luck!
string: イスランから何か言いつかったのかい？ あんたなら気に入られると思っていたよ。幸運を！

original: I'll tell you, the only thing more surprising than hearing from Isran after all these years was hearing that he wanted my help.
string: イスランが今さら連絡を寄こしたのも驚きだが、奴が俺の助けを求めてるってのはもっと驚きだ

original: I immediately realized things must be pretty bad. Looks like I was right.
string: 相当ヤバい事になってるのはすぐに察しがついたが、どうやら図星だったらしいな

original: DLC1ThrallHellos
string: DLC1ThrallHellos

original: Where... am I...
string: ここは… どこ…

original: Need... to sleep...
string: 眠らなくては…

original: What's happening...
string: 何が起きている…

original: Who are you?...
string: あなたは誰… ？

original: Please... No more...
string: 頼む… これ以上…

original: Let me go...
string: 放してくれ…

original: Why me...
string: なぜ私が…

original: Death first!
string: さっさと死ね！

original: Surrender and give us the bow!
string: 降伏して弓を渡しなさいな！

original: Child, my life ended long before you were born!
string: ガキめ、貴様が生まれるはるか前に、命など捨てたのだ！

original: Your life ends here, Vyrthur!
string: お前の命はここで尽きますのよ、ヴィルスール！

original: Watch out! He's pulling down the ceiling!
string: 気を付けて！ 天井を落とすつもりですわ！

original: Let's finish this!
string: 終わらせてやる！

original: Enough of these games. Fight me!
string: 遊びは終わりだ、堂々と戦え！

original: We end this here and now!
string: 今、ここで決着をつけてやる！

original: Craven fool. This isn't over.
string: 愚かな臆病者め。これで終わりだと思うな

original: Hide if you wish, it matters little to me.
string: 好きなだけ隠れるがいい。何も変わらない

original: Run, coward! Run and never return!
string: 行け、腰抜けめ！ 二度と来るな！

original: Pitiful sorcery. You'll not stay hidden long.
string: 下らん魔法だ。すぐに姿を現す事になる

original: You only delay the inevitable.
string: 逃げ回っても、どうせ死ぬのだぞ

original: I'll feed your corpse to the Betrayed.
string: 死体は裏切られし者の餌にしてやる

original: Hide if you wish. It's only a matter of time.
string: 好きなだけ隠れるがいい。すぐに見つけてやる

original: Come and face your destruction!
string: さあ来い、死を受け入れろ！

original: There you are!
string: そこだ！

original: This time, to the death!
string: 今こそ死ぬがいい！

original: What trickery is this?
string: 何の茶番だこれは？

original: This is a waste of time.
string: 時間の無駄だ

original: I'll find you yet, coward.
string: すぐ見つけてやるぞ、卑怯者め

original: Enough of these games.
string: 遊びは終わりだ

original: Show yourself.
string: 出てこい

original: This is pointless.
string: こんな事は無駄だ

original: Centuries of preparation will not fall to ruin because of you!
string: 何世紀もかけたこの計画を、貴様ごときに潰させはしない！

original: I will herald the fall of eternal night!
string: 我こそは、永遠の闇の始まりを告げる者だ！

original: Let twilight fall and blood spill!
string: 世界を闇で包み、血で染めろ！

original: Your existence is meaningless!
string: 貴様の存在など、何の意味もない！

original: Farewell.
string: さらばだ

original: What... have I done... Auri-Eil forgive me...
string: 私は… 一体何を… アーリエルよ、ご慈悲を…

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: Unh!
string: あああ！

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: Hhyyaarrggh!
string: はああー！

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: DLC1VQ07Attack
string: DLC1VQ07Attack

original: Her blood will be mine!
string: その娘の血は私のものだ！

original: You're no match for me!
string: 貴様などには負けん！

original: You can't stop the inevitable!
string: 死を避ける事はできないぞ！

original: Your pathetic powers are no match for mine!
string: その程度の力で、勝てると思うな！

original: I'll scatter your ashes myself!
string: 風に舞う塵となれ！

original: Die, damn it... die!
string: 死ね、クズめが… 死ね！

original: I'll stain the ground with your blood!
string: 血の海でもがき苦しめ！

original: The prophecy's end approaches!
string: 予言された終末は近いぞ！

original: You have no dominion here!
string: ここでは貴様など、何の力もない！

original: I'll darken the skies with her blood!
string: その娘の血で空を黒く染めてやろう！

original: Your suffering will be legendary!
string: その苦しみは伝説として残るだろう！

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello
string: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello

original: Well, look what we have here... someone with flesh on their bones.
string: おや、誰かと思えば… 肉づきのいい人じゃないか

original: What do you want now?
string: 望みは何だ？

original: Brought some soul husks or are you wasting my time?
string: 魂のハスクを持ってきたのか？ それとも私の時間を無駄にしたいのか？

original: What's the matter with you?
string: どうかしたのか？

original: Let's just say I sold something to a guy who turned out to work for a whole coven of necromancers.
string: 死霊術師の集団の御用人に何かを売った… とでも言っておこうか

original: How in the name of Zenithar was I to know the ingredients were phony? Do I look like someone that would double-cross a necromancer?
string: ゼニタールに誓って言うが、商品が偽物だなんて知りようがなかったよ。俺が死霊術師をあざむくような奴に見えるかい？

original: We don't have many other options, do we?
string: 他に選択肢はあまりないようだな

original: If you're so worried about the trolls, why agree to let me go ahead with it?
string: トロールの事がそこまで心配なら、何故止めなかったんだ？

original: There's enough for us to fight out there. I don't need us having to defend ourselves within our own fort.
string: 外にも敵は十分すぎるほどいるのに、砦の中でも身を守るなんて事態は避けたい

original: I told you, I've prepared for this. It's going to work.
string: 言っただろ、準備はしてある。うまくいくさ

original: We're not going to have a problem with your little... project, are we?
string: 君のちょっとした… 計画とやらはうまくいくんだろうな？

original: Well, that's certainly a line of thinking I can relate to.
string: その事については、考えてる事があるの

original: And then realizing a troll with armor is even more intimidating.
string: でもって、鎧を着たトロールはさらに厄介だ、と

original: Oh. Well, I'm not sure. I guess it came from fighting them, thinking "what could be worse?"
string: そうだな…奴らと戦いつつ、「これ以上最悪な事があるか」と思った事か？

original: I mean, why would that idea even cross your mind?
string: つまり、どうしてそんな事考えつくわけ？

original: What?
string: 何？

original: Why in the world did you ever try putting armor on trolls?
string: トロールに防具をつけさせて、一体どうするつもりなの？

original: I suppose we're all a little crazy to be here, right?
string: ここに来てる時点で、頭おかしいと思わない？

original: I didn't say that. I wondered if perhaps he did it for the attention, but every now and then he'll say something that makes me reconsider.
string: そうは言ってない。かまってほしくてやったのかと思ったが、時々考え直させられるような事を言ってくるんだ

original: So, you think he's just crazy?
string: 彼はイカれてると思う？

original: I'm... not sure. I've never heard of the Divines speaking directly to someone before.
string: 何とも言えない。神々が今まで直接誰かに話しかけた例は聞いてない

original: Do you think Florentius really talks to Arkay?
string: フロレンティウスは本当にアーケイと話してると思う？

original: Fair enough.
string: なるほど

original: Why do you think I was asking?
string: あなたに尋ねたと思ったの？

original: No. I try to avoid it. Always seems to end in an argument. You?
string: いや、避けるようにしている。口げんかが関の山だからだ。そちらは？

original: Have you talked to Isran?
string: イスランとは話した？

original: That's why I always try to be ready for anything.
string: こういう事があるから、備えが大切なのよね

original: Nothing. Well, not on purpose. But you never know. The strangest accidents can happen at any time.
string: 何も。少なくとも、故意ではないわ。まあ、何が起こるかは、誰にも分からないものよね

original: What are you doing that's so dangerous?
string: そんなに危険な事とは？

original: Fairly well, I'd say. I've managed to get this far without blowing myself up, I still have all my limbs...
string: かなりいいと思う。ここまでの開発で、爆発もしてないし、手足もちゃんと無事だし…

original: How is the work coming along?
string: 進み具合はどうだ？

original: Fine. You could've just said 'no'.
string: 分かったわ。一言「ダメ」って言えばいいのよ

original: Are you mad, woman? After the trouble I've gone through?
string: 正気か、お嬢さん？ これだけやった挙句にか？

original: Well I need to do some testing on this new weapon, and I was thinking a live target would be helpful.
string: この新しい武器の性能を確かめたいんだけど、生き物を的にして試すのがいいと思うの

original: Why?
string: どうしてだ？

original: Gunmar, do you think I could borrow a troll?
string: ガンマー、トロールを借りてもいい？

original: How did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうやってドーンガードの一員に？

original: Something bad happens, word spreads. More bad things happen, people worry.
string: 悪い事が起きると、うわさが広まる。さらに悪い事が起きると、人々は不安になる

original: The more they worry, the more they talk about it. I've been hearing rumors for a bit now.
string: 不安が高まれば、人々はもっとその事を口々にする。そして、すでに少しうわさを耳にした

original: I was glad to find out not only the bad rumors were true.
string: 悪いうわさだけが真実ではないと分かってうれしかったわ

original: Do you know where I can find him?
string: どこに行けば会えるだろうか？

original: Florentius still worked with the Order from time to time.
string: フロレンティウスはその後も時々教団と仕事をしていた

original: Last I knew, he was headed to Ruunvald. But then, we hadn't heard from anyone there in a few weeks.
string: 最後に聞いた時はルーンヴァルドに向かっていたが、その時点で音信は数週間途絶えていた

original: If he's moved on, perhaps the Vigilants there can tell you where he's gone.
string: もしそこからさらに移動したなら、現地にいる番人達が行き先を知ってるかもな

original: Does Isran have a problem with him?
string: イスランとの間に何か問題でも？

original: Isran has a problem with most people, if you haven't yet noticed.
string: イスランは大抵の相手と対立してしまうからな、気づいているとは思うが

original: No, this was different. He never trusted Florentius, always thought him to be trying to get attention.
string: いや、違うな。フロレンティウスは目立ちたがっていると言って、まるで信用していなかった

original: I can't imagine that opinion has changed.
string: その考えが変わったとは思いにくい

original: What about the scroll?
string: 星霜の書が何か？

original: The reason I had it... and why I was down there.
string: 星霜の書を持っていて、あそこにいた理由…

original: What about you?
string: あなた自身のこと？

original: The reason I was down there... and why I had the Elder Scroll.
string: わたしがあそこにいて、星霜の書を持っていた理由…

original: Turns out you don't learn much from just sleeping with something.
string: 何かと一緒に寝るだけでは、大した事は学べないみたいですわね

original: Arvak!  Where are you, boy?
string: アルヴァク！ どこにいるんだい？

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: Do you think there's more Aetherium somewhere?
string: まだエセリウムがどこかにあるだろうか？

original: There isn't any Aetherium here, is there? Damn it!
string: ここにエセリウムはないんだね？ ああもう！

original: Wait! ...Yes, yes there is. The shards we collected... they're pure Aetherium, remember? It's not much, but it'll do.
string: 待って！ …うん、あるよ。集めた破片は… 純粋なエセリウムだよ、覚えてる？ 多くはないけど、使えるね

original: With them, and the materials in this room, we should have everything we need.
string: それと、この部屋の材料があれば、必要なものはすべて揃うはず

original: Forge something? With what?
string: 鋳造って？ 材料は？

original: It feels... old, doesn't it? Even by dwarven standards. No one has been here in thousands of years.
string: 古い感じだね… そうじゃない？ ドワーフの基準をもってしても。数千年間、誰もここに来ていない

original: What do you think of this place?
string: この場所の印象は？

original: I... fell. When the earthquake hit. The ground just... opened up.
string: …落ちたんだよ。地震が起きた時。地面が自然に… 開いたんだ

original: Even so, I almost made it... another foot or two to the side, and the water would have broken my fall. But... nothing I could do.
string: それでも、あと少しだった… 横にあと一歩か二歩で、水が落下を受けとめてくれたはず。でも… 仕方ないね

original: How did you die?
string: どうして死んだんだ？

original: Oh, gods...
string: ああ、神よ…

original: Look out!
string: 気をつけて！

original: Damn it, not again!
string: もう、またか！

original: Not again!
string: 勘弁してよね！

original: Keep going...
string: 続けて…

original: Almost...
string: あと少しだよ…

original: So close...
string: もうすぐだ…

original: That's it...
string: それでいい…

original: Good...
string: よし…

original: All right...
string: 大丈夫よ…

original: Just hit them, and they'll... do whatever it is they're supposed to do.
string: 叩いてみて、そうすれば… 必要な仕掛けを担ってくれるはず

original: See that thing? Dwarves called them 'Kinetic Resonators'. Don't see them very often, least not among the clans in Skyrim.
string: あれが見える？ ドワーフは“動力共鳴装置”と呼んでる。スカイリムの人々には殆ど知られちゃいない代物だよ

original: Which, I'm sorry to say, means your usefulness is at an end!
string: つまり、お前はもう用済みだという事だ！

original: You've done exactly as I predicted and brought your fetching companion to me.
string: 確かにお前は言った通りの仕事を終え、魅力的な人物を連れ帰ってきた

original: Did you really come here expecting to claim Auriel's Bow?
string: ここに来ればアーリエルの弓が手に入ると、本気で思ったのか？

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: An old jetty where boats would bring supplies to the castle. Once we moved in, it never got used, along with the rest of the undercroft.
string: 城に物資を運ぶ船がつけていた古い桟橋ですわね。わたし達が住みついてからは、地下の設備共々、一度も使いませんでしたわ

original: We'll need to watch our steps inside.
string: 中では慎重に進まないと

original: Yeah, just around this bend.
string: そうですわ、あそこを曲がったところ

original: Castle looks so big from down here. I mean, it is big, but, well, even bigger.
string: 下から見上げると随分大きく見えますわね。いえ、実際大きいのですけれど、それ以上に大きく見えるという事ですわ

original: I used to hide down here and look out at the sea. Usually when my father was in a bad mood.
string: よくここに隠れて海を眺めたものでしたわ。大抵は父の機嫌が悪い時でしたのよ

original: Do you think this would help? (Give Journal)
string: これは手がかりになるだろうか？(日記を渡す)

original: You've found her journal!
string: 日記が見つかったのですね！

original: Let me take a look at it.
string: わたしに読ませて

original: Come, infidel, meet your end!
string: 異端者め、死を受け入れるがいい！

original: I won't let you defile this place, foul being!
string: この場所を穢す者は許さん！

original: Auri-El, give me strength to smite my foe!
string: アーリエルよ、この敵を倒す力を私に！

original: I will send you back to the shadows!
string: 闇へ還してやる！

original: Step from the shadows, defiler.
string: 陰に隠れず出てこい、冒涜者め！

original: What was that?
string: 今のは何だ？

original: Another time, perhaps.
string: また次がある

original: Leave this place.
string: ここから立ち去れ

original: Your time is at an end!
string: これで終わりだ！

original: I will erase you from existence!
string: この世から消し去ってやる！

original: Your time will come.
string: 終わりは近いぞ

original: I cast you to Oblivion!
string: オブリビオンに送ってやる！

original: I absolve you of your sins!
string: 罪深き命を消し去ってやる！

original: Auri-El forgives you.
string: アーリエルの許しを請え

original: Your deception is useless. I'll find you.
string: 惑わされないぞ。すぐ捕えてやる

original: Why hide? Face Auri-El. Face your end!
string: なぜ隠れる？ 出てきてアーリエルの裁きを受けろ！

original: Were did you go?
string: どこへ行った？

original: Perhaps it was nothing after all.
string: 大した事じゃないだろう

original: I've found the infidel!
string: ここにいたか、異端者め！

original: I see you, heathen!
string: 見つけたぞ、野蛮人め！

original: I'll find you soon.
string: すぐに見つけてやる

original: Where are you!
string: どこにいる！

original: It's only a matter of time!
string: 逃げられると思うな！

original: May the light of Auri-El cleanse your soul!
string: アーリエルの光で罪を洗い流すがいい！

original: Your death will be my gift to Auri-El!
string: 貴様の命をアーリエルに捧げてやろう！

original: You will not leave this valley alive!
string: 生きてこの峡谷を出られると思うな！

original: Death to those who defile the Chantry!
string: 礼拝所を穢す者に死を！

original: A swift death is all you deserve!
string: 今すぐ死んで罪を償え！

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: Hhyyaarrggh!
string: はああー！

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: Uhhhhh.
string: ううっ
そんな…

original: Arrrgh...
string: ああ…

original: Auri-El... save me...
string: アーリエルよ… ご加護を…

original: I've failed you... my lord...
string: 神よ… 御心に応えられませんでした…

original: Forgive me... Auri-El...
string: ご慈悲を… アーリエル…

original: My time... has come...
string: これで… 最後か…

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: For Auri-El!
string: アーリエルのために！

original: Die, heathen!
string: 死ね、異端の者め！

original: Begone, foul creature!
string: 邪悪な種族め、消え去るがいい！

original: I cast you out!
string: 消し去ってやる！

original: Let Auri-El smite you with his wrath!
string: アーリエルの怒りを受けろ！

original: Back, godless beast!
string: 立ち去れ、神の冒涜者め！

original: Back to the darkness with you!
string: 闇へ帰るがいい！

original: How dare you profane this place!
string: この場所を穢す事は許さん！

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: I need to go there anyway.
string: いずれにせよそこに行かないと

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: Take me near the castle to the west. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge> gold)
string: 西の城へと渡してほしい(<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge>ゴールド)

original: An island near the border to Highrock.
string: ハイロックとの境界線近くの島だ

original: Windhelm. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ウィンドヘルム(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: Dawnstar. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ドーンスター(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: Solitude. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ソリチュード(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: Looking to hire a boat?
string: 船を雇いたいのかい？

original: I can take you to any port on the coast.
string: 沿岸の港ならどこにでもいくよ

original: May not look like much, but my boat can get you there faster than walking.
string: 大した船には見えないだろうが、歩いていくよりは早いぜ

original: Where are you headed?
string: どこへ向かう？

original: You just enjoy the fresh air and leave the rowing to me.
string: こぐのは任せて、新鮮な空気を存分に味わってくれ

original: Yeah, all right. I'll take you as far as I can.
string: ああ、いいとも。超特急で連れてってやるさ

original: Climb on in the boat and get comfortable.
string: 船に乗ってくつろいでくれ

original: Climb on in and let's get this over with.
string: 乗ってくれ。さっさと済ましてしまおう

original: You think I do this for my health? Come back when you've got the coin.
string: 健康のためにやってるとでも？ 金をこしらえてから来な

original: The one with the ruined castle? Don't you know that place is cursed? Even seasoned sailors steer far around that place.
string: 城の廃墟がある所かい？ あの島は呪われてるのを知らないのか？ ベテランの船乗りだって避けて通る場所だぞ？

original: I'll take you as far as I can, but I'm not hanging around and it's gonna cost you extra.
string: 遠いのは構わないが、向こうで待ってるのはごめんだよ。どうしてもって言うなら別料金をもらう

original: All right.
string: いいだろう

original: I'd like to hire your boat.
string: 船で行きたいところがある

original: What do we do now?
string: これからどうする？

original: I think we both know... it's time to face my father.
string: わたし達二人とも分かっているはずでしてよ… 父と対決する時が来た事を

original: If we don't, he'll keep chasing us for the rest of our lives.
string: この時を避けたら、残りの人生ずっと彼に追いかけ回されますわよ

original: Nothing right now.
string: 今は特にない

original: Oh sure, keep pestering me then, by all means.
string: いいよ、好きなだけ商売の邪魔でもしてくれ

original: No husks, no sale. Guess you have some scavenging to do.
string: ハスクがなけりゃ売れないね。探してきなよ

original: I don't have 25 husks.
string: ハスク25個の手持ちはないな

original: Heavy armor. (25 husks)
string: 重装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: This won't stop your soul from getting ripped out, but at least you'll look good when your corpse hits the ground.
string: こいつを着てても死ぬ時は死ぬけど、立派な格好で死ねるだけましだよ

original: Light armor. (25 husks)
string: 軽装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: Well, I hate to see it go, but what am I gonna do with it here anyway?
string: 本当は手放したくないけど、ここでそんなもの持っててもしょうがないしな

original: A battleaxe. (25 husks)
string: 両手斧(魂のハスク25個)

original: I can't believe I'm trading this for some dried up plants. Oh well, a sale's a sale.
string: こいつをしなびた植物と交換するなんて信じられないよ。まあ、商売は商売だ

original: See you around... if you live long enough.
string: また会おう… 君が長生きできたら

original: You still got it, Morven... a salesman even beyond the end.
string: モルベン、お前はまだ大丈夫だ… 最後の最後まで商売人さ

original: A sword. (25 husks)
string: 剣(魂のハスク25個)

original: A wondrous blade... ahhh, never mind. Just take the darn thing.
string: これぞ伝説の剣… あああ、気にしないでくれ。持っていきな

original: Got anything left to sell?
string: 他に売ってもらえそうなものは？

original: I might be just a soul now, but I'm still not going to give my stuff away. Bring me at least twenty-five husks and then we'll talk.
string: どれほど落ちぶれても自分のものをただで手放すわけにはいかないよ。最低でもハスクを25個持ってきてくれたら話を聞こう

original: Sure, got plenty. What am I gonna' do with it?
string: もちろんたくさん持ってるよ。何に使うとするかな？

original: Well, I've been so busy, I dunno. What are you, kidding me?
string: さあね、ずっと忙しかったんだ。何のつもりだ？ からかってるのか？

original: Of course I do. What do you want?
string: もちろんさ。何がほしいんだ？

original: Got anything left?
string: 他に何かあるか？

original: Very funny.
string: 面白いね

original: And what exactly are you going to pay me with? Take a look around. Gold doesn't exactly win you any friends around here.
string: 支払いはどうやって？ 周りを見ろよ。この辺じゃあゴールドを持っててもそんなに意味はないぞ

original: So that's how you got here.
string: そうしてここにやって来たわけか

original: You got it. Horse, wagon and all. Plopped here without so much as a word.
string: 馬でも馬車でも何でもありさ。何も言わなくてもここにドサっと集まるんだ

original: I used to be one of the best traders in High Rock, you know. People would track me down just to see what I had for sale.
string: 昔はハイロックで最高の商人の一人だった。うちの商品が見たくてみんな俺を追いかけたもんだ

original: You seem to have lost the gift that Lord Harkon gave you. I suggest you tell him at once.
string: ハルコン卿からの贈り物を失くしたみたいじゃないか。その事をすぐ彼に言った方がいいよ

original: Hopefully he'll be gracious enough to make you one of us again.
string: 彼が寛大にも君をまた仲間にしてくれるといいね

original: You seem to have lost the gift that has been given to you. Perhaps Serana will grant it to you again.
string: せっかくもらった贈り物を失くしたみたいだね。多分セラーナがまたくれるんじゃないかな

original: You would dare show up here after becoming mortal, abandoning all that Lord Harkon has granted you?
string: ハルコン卿に与えられたものをすべて捨て去り、定命の体になった上でここに姿を現すとはな

original: You'd best find him soon. Ask him to change you back.
string: すぐに会って、元に戻してもらうようお願いするんだな

original: Look at you. Mortal. Weak.
string: ぜい弱な定命の体とは、情けない姿だ

original: I suggest you have Serana change you back. At once.
string: セラーナに頼んで元に戻してもらうといい。直ちにな

original: You're... you're mortal! What are you doing here like that?
string: あなたは… 定命の者！ そんな状態でここで何をしているの？

original: Go to Lord Harkon at once, beg him to turn you back. You're dead if you don't.
string: すぐにハルコン卿のもとへ行って、戻してもらうよう頼んできなさい。さもなければ死ぬわよ

original: You can't walk around here like some common mortal!
string: 平凡な定命の者みたいにここを歩き回ってはだめよ！

original: Ask Serana to make you one of us again, before someone makes a meal out of you.
string: 誰かがあなたを食べてしまう前に、セラーナに頼んでまた私達の仲間にしてもらいなさい

original: It's disrespectful and dangerous to walk around here mortal. What were you thinking?
string: 定命の者がここを歩き回るのは無礼で危険な事よ。何を考えていたの？

original: You'd best beg Lord Harkon to turn you at once. Although, you do smell delicious...
string: 今すぐハルコン卿に頼んで自分を変えてもらうべきよ。実においしそうな匂いだけどね…

original: You've given up the powers granted to you? Get away from me. I don't want to be seen talking to you.
string: 授かった力を放棄したのか？ あっちへ行ってくれないか。お前なんかと話をしているのを見られたくない

original: You're a fool to have become mortal again. I want nothing to do with you.
string: 再び定命の者に戻るとは愚かな。あなたとかかわる気はない

original: Without the royal blood flowing through you, you're one step away from the rest of the thralls.
string: 体に流れる王族の血がなければ、従徒どもとお前の違いは微々たるものだ

original: You disrespect Lord Harkon by walking around here like that. Go see him at once, else you might find yourself in a cage.
string: そのように歩きまわるのはハルコン卿に対する非礼だ。直ちに拝謁しに行け、さもないと檻にぶち込むぞ

original: Without the royal blood flowing through you, you're one step away from the rest of the thralls.
string: 体に流れる王族の血がなければ、従徒どもとお前の違いは微々たるものだ

original: Serana can make you one of us again.
string: セラーナがもう一度お前を我らの一員に変えてくれる

original: Quite bold, to return here as a mortal. Some will take offense.
string: 定命の者としてここに戻ってくるなんて、ずいぶん大胆だね。よく思わない者も中にはいるのに

original: You really ought to become one of us again. Bad for your health, otherwise.
string: 再び我々の仲間になるべきだ。君の体のためにもね

original: You're mortal? What are you doing here like that?
string: あんた定命の者かい？ こんな所で何をやってるんだ？

original: No, no, you must get away! If I'm seen talking to you, they'll blame me!
string: ちょっと、近づかないでくれよ！ こんなところを誰かに見られたら目も当てられない！

original: Mortals aren't allowed to freely roam the castle. Not even you.
string: たとえお前でも、定命の者が自由に城をうろつく事は許されない

original: Find Lord Harkon at once and ask him to please... "correct" the situation.
string: すぐにハルコン卿を見つけ、彼に… 状況を“正して”くれるよう頼め

original: You are worth very little if you're not one of us.
string: 我らの仲間でなければ、お前はほぼ無価値だ

original: Serana can change that. I suggest you ask her to.
string: セラーナに変えてもらうよう頼むがいい

original: If you're not one of us, you're just another piece of meat.
string: 私達の仲間でないなら、あなたはただの肉片と同じよ

original: Talk to Serana, and decide which you want to be.
string: セラーナと話して、どちらになりたいか決めなさい

original: I await your answer.
string: 答えはまだか

original: Maybe this will put your mind at ease. (<bribecost> gold)
string: これで気が変わるかな？(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: Oh, good. Well then... let's head over to the portal vessel and I'll do the rest.
string: それはよかったですわ。…それなら、転移門の器の所まで行きましょう。後はわたしが

original: I already found all of the ingredients.
string: 材料は全部見つけた

original: Oh, definitely. Mother would have plenty of those materials in her laboratory, you just need to find them.
string: ええ、あるはずですわ。母はそういった素材を研究室にたっぷり蓄えていたから。探せば見つかるかと

original: Are all of those ingredients here?
string: 材料はここで全部そろうのか？

original: Not the most solid construction here. About what I'd expect from... creatures like this.
string: ここの造りは微妙ですけれど、このあたりに関しては例外ですわね…

original: It sounds like they were both being selfish.
string: どちらも身勝手だったみたいだな

original: Definitely. You must think my life has been so strange. It sounds like your family wasn't nearly as fractured as mine.
string: そのとおりですわ。わたしの人生がすごく変わってるとあなたは思うのかしらね。わたしと違って、あなたの家族は全然壊れてなかったのでしょうから

original: Oh, they definitely were.
string: ええ、間違いなくそうでしたわ

original: I just wonder if that meant it was my job to be giving.
string: あれは、わたしの役割が担う事という意味でしたのかしら

original: Anyway, we should keep moving.
string: とにかく、先を急ぎましょう

original: It probably didn't have anything to do with you.
string: おそらく君がどうこうという話じゃなかったんだろうな

original: That's easy to say, but I definitely didn't help things.
string: 口で言うのは簡単でしょうけれど、わたしにはどうする事もできませんでしたの

original: You shouldn't blame yourself.
string: 自分を責めるべきじゃない

original: You don't know what it's like, coming from a family like that.
string: そんな家庭で育つのがどんな事か、あなたには分かりませんわ

original: Everything eventually tumbles down to you.
string: 何もかも結局は他人事ですものね

original: I know that in my head. But I just can't help feeling bad about... the way things are.
string: 頭ではその事が分かっておりますわ。ですが心はとめどなくて… 現状を嘆いてしまいますのよ

original: Sorry, I know you're trying to help. Thanks.
string: ごめんなさい。あなたの善意は分かっておりますのよ。ありがとう

original: It sounds like you already didn't like him much.
string: 元々そこまで好きではなかった様子だな

original: Like I said, we were never very close. Not a lot of father-daughter bonding if you know what I mean.
string: 承知の通り、わたし達の仲がいい事なんて一度もございませんでしたわ。父と娘の間に絆なんて存在しませんでしたの。お分かりになって？

original: But once we threw our lot in with Molag Bal... people just don't think about their families anymore. "Power takes precedence," he always said.
string: けれどモラグ・バルに運命をゆだねると… 家族の事なんてどうでもよくなってしまいますの。父はいつも「力の前に力なし」と言っていましたわ

original: Did your mother keep gargoyles here?
string: 母親はここでガーゴイルを飼っていたのか？

original: Not that I ever saw.
string: 見た事はございませんの

original: My mother had a bit of a thing for magical constructs. Not... not what you're thinking. She just found them fascinating.
string: 母や魔術で作られたものに興味を持ってはいましたけれど… あなたが思っている意味ではなく、神秘的に感じていた程度の事ですわ

original: I've never even seen this part of the castle before. Be careful. I don't know what might be around.
string: お城のこの部分には来た事がありませんの。用心なさって。何があるか分かりませんわ

original: Do you know this place?
string: この場所は知っているのか？

original: I had always just assumed that the other tower was completely destroyed inside.
string: もうひとつの塔は内部がめちゃくちゃに壊されていると、ずっと思っておりましたの

original: My mother kept this a secret, even from me. She must have been up to something she thought was dangerous.
string: 母はこの事をわたしにさえ秘密にしていましたわ。きっと何か危ない事をやっていたのですわね

original: That sounds pretty lonely.
string: それは孤独だったろうな

original: It was.
string: 昔はそうでしたわね

original: But I got used to it.
string: でももう慣れましたわ

original: You sound like you were a weird little kid.
string: だいぶひねくれた子供だったみたいだな

original: I was.
string: 以前はそうでしたわね

original: But I think I turned out ok.
string: でも今は大丈夫ですわ

original: What did this area used to be?
string: この一帯、元々は？

original: Who knows? It was in shambles when we first got here.
string: 分かりませんわ。最初に来た時点で荒廃しておりましたの

original: My father's never been much for building things, so it just stayed like this.
string: 父は建築まわりに詳しくなかったから、そのままになっておりましたわ

original: The poor thing living here probably just fell out of favor upstairs.
string: ここにいるお気の毒な方は、上の階で機嫌を損ねたのでしょうね

original: This leads out to the courtyard. Just head for the door.
string: ここを行けば中庭に出ますわ。まっすぐ扉に向かって

original: Did you spend a lot of time down here?
string: よくここに来ていたのか？

original: I liked to explore. My parents almost never let me off the island, so yeah, I poked around down here a lot.
string: 探検するのが好きでしたの。両親がほとんど島の外に出してくれませんでしたから、ここをずいぶん見て回りましたわ

original: It was a little... quieter... back then. Guess a little vampire girl was enough to scare off the rats.
string: 当時はもう少し… 静かなところでしたわね。吸血鬼の少女でもネズミを十分追い払えましたわよ

original: Take a left up here. This is one of those weird double-barred security measures that my father put in when he got more paranoid.
string: 左に折れて。これは例の複式施錠装置の1つですわ。疑心暗鬼を募らせた父が設置したものですわね

original: If we follow that path around, we can find the other switch.
string: 向こうの道をたどれば、別のスイッチが見つかるはずですわ

original: The old water cistern. On some days, this would smell just... be glad you weren't here then.
string: 古い貯水池ですわ。ここの臭いときたら日によっては… 言わぬが花というものですわね

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: Maybe this will put your mind at ease. (<bribecost> gold)
string: これで気が変わるかな？(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: I'll try my luck elsewhere.
string: 他を当たってみよう

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: I'll try my luck elsewhere.
string: 他を当たってみよう

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: My lord! Everyone! Serana has returned!
string: 主様！ みんな！ セラーナが戻ったぞ！

original: Wait... Serana? Is that truly you? I cannot believe my eyes!
string: ちょっと待った… セラーナ？ 本当に君なのか？ 信じられない！

original: How dare you trespass here!
string: よくここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな！

original: Well, it seems the Dawnguard really is needed again.
string: どうやらドーンガードの復活が急務のようだ

original: While I ready things here, you find out what this woman means to the vampires. She must be important somehow.
string: 私がここで準備している間に、君はその女性が吸血鬼達にとってどういう存在なのかを探ってくれ。彼女には何か重要な意味が隠されているはずだ

original: I'll admit, I don't know that I can trust you, but I know I can't rely on the Vigilants for anything. So we'll have to work together for now.
string: 正直言って、君を信頼していいのかどうかは分からん。だが番人達が役立たずとあっては、我々は協力せざるを得ない

original: If you can prove you're reliable, maybe you can join the Dawnguard. We have ways of dealing with vampires.
string: 君が頼りになると証明されたら、ドーンガードに参加してもいい。我々は吸血鬼の扱いに慣れている

original: I don't know, but she must be connected.
string: わからないが、人脈はありそうだった

original: Why her? What significance does she have? We don't have enough information.
string: なぜ彼女が？ 彼女に何の意味があるんだ？ 情報が足りないようだ

original: She just wants to go home.
string: 家に帰りたいだけだろう

original: None of this feels right. We need to know more.
string: 話がどうもしっくりこない。もっと情報が必要だな

original: They were trying to free a woman trapped in a crypt.
string: 墓地に閉じ込められた女性を解放しようとしていた

original: None of this makes any sense. What does she have to do with this?
string: どうも話が分からないな。彼女はこの件とどう関係しているんだ？

original: Do we at least know what the vampires are after?
string: 我々に吸血鬼どもの狙いが少しでも分かっているのか？

original: I don't relax. Ever.
string: 気が休まる時などないよ。一瞬たりとも

original: Right. Well, you can relax. I have it under control.
string: そうか、なら安心しろ。こちらで何とかする

original: I can't afford to make any assumptions. That's how people wind up dead.
string: 仮定の話をする余裕はない。そんな事をしてたら死ぬのがオチだ

original: You know I'm more than capable. Why are you bringing this up?
string: 腕前は知ってるだろう？ 何でそんな話をするんだ？

original: Can I cound on you to handle whatever smithing work we need done? Repairs, new armor, weapons...
string: 鍛冶仕事なら何でも君に任せていいだろうか？ 修理とか、新しい防具や武器の製造とか…

original: This is a statue of Auriel, but it's using the older signs of his power. This temple must be ancient.
string: これはアーリエルの像ですわね。ですが彼の力を示す比較的古い印が使われているところを見るに、この聖堂は相当古いに違いありませんわ

original: The bow has to be in here.
string: きっと弓はここにありましてよ

original: That... has to be the place. I've never seen a building like that before.
string: きっと… あれがそうですわ。あんな建物は見た事がありませんもの

original: It looks like some kind of temple.
string: どうやら聖堂か何かのようですわね

original: Does this ice feel a little... thin to you?
string: この氷、少しばかり… 薄くありませんこと？

original: Ugh. I told you!
string: きゃっ。もう、言いましたわよね！

original: Next time I say to please not go over the waterfall, maybe you'll listen to me.
string: だから滝の向こうには行かないでと頼みましたのに。少しは耳を貸す気になりまして？

original: Careful, here. If you fall down that thing I'm going to have to drag you out of... wherever it leads.
string: 用心なさって。もしあなたがあそこに落ちたら、どこにつながっているにせよ… わたしが引っぱり上げる事になりますのよ

original: More spiders? I liked the ones back home better.
string: またスパイダーですの？ 故郷ではそんなに苦手ではありませんでしたけど

original: I think that's another wayshrine up there. Here we go.
string: あそこにあるのは旅の祠かしら。行ってみましょう

original: Is that another one of those wayshrines up there? I wonder where this one goes...
string: あそこにあるのは旅の祠ではなくて？ あれはどこと繋がっているのかしら…

original: These things are everywhere, aren't they?
string: これってどこにでもありますのね

original: If we open that one, we'll be able to move around this valley a lot faster.
string: あれを開けば、この谷をずっと速くまわれるようになりますわ

original: This is incredible. It's like a whole other world.
string: 信じられませんわ。まるで別世界ですわよ

original: Poor thing. I know it would have tried to kill us, but still...
string: 哀れなものですわ。わたし達を殺そうとしたかも知れない相手ですけど、それでも…

original: Looks like they're better at making traps than they are at making bridges.
string: 彼らは橋を造るよりも罠をこしらえる方が得意だったようですわね

original: A strange race, these Falmer.
string: 変わった種族ですわ、このファルメルというのは

original: Why is that?
string: なぜなんだ？

original: The Elder Scrolls vanished from the Imperial City around 175 of this era and have been scattered across Tamriel by forces unknown.
string: 星霜の書は今世紀の175年頃に帝都から紛失し、未知の力によってタムリエルのあちこちにばらまかれた

original: If you want to find the remaining scroll, you'll have to consult with someone versed in magical knowledge. Perhaps at the College of Winterhold?
string: 残りの書を見つけたいなら、魔法の知識を持つ者に相談すべきだ。ウィンターホールド大学に行ってみてはどうかな？

original: I need the Elder Scroll that speaks of dragons.
string: 竜族について書かれた星霜の書がほしい

original: I wish I could help. The scrolls have changed hands so many times, it's impossible to keep track.
string: 力になれなくて残念だよ。書はその持ち主が何度も変わるうちに、ついに行方が分からなくなってしまった

original: Normally, I'd send you to the Imperial City in Cyrodiil to seek answers at the Imperial Library, but that avenue no longer exists.
string: 本来ならシロディールの帝都にある帝国図書館で答えを探す事をお勧めしたいが、あそこの通りはなくなってしまったんだ

original: Any clues about the other Elder Scroll?
string: もう一つの星霜の書について何か手がかりは？

original: Dexion said something about that scroll. What was it... something to do with dragons I think?
string: デキソンがあの書の事を何か言っておりましたわ。あれは一体… ドラゴンに関係するものかしら？

original: Maybe we should try asking at the College of Winterhold. Sounds like something they'd know about.
string: ウィンターホールド大学に行って聞いた方がいいですわね。彼らなら何か知ってそうですし

original: These Vigilants never know when to give up. I thought we'd taught them enough of a lesson at their hall.
string: 番人どももあきらめが悪いな。番人の間で思い知らせてやったつもりが

original: If you're putting yourself in harm's way, you'd best be prepared. Take these.
string: 身を危険にさらすなら、準備は入念にすべきだ。これを使うといい

original: The Chalice has been in Lord Harkon's possession for quite some time now. It is, when used properly, able to increase the potency of our powers.
string: 聖杯はかなり以前からハルコン卿の手元にある。適切に使えば、我らの潜在能力を増幅できるものだ

original: He has neglected using it for ages. If he wants it filled now, then grander things are afoot. This is good.
string: 彼は長い間それを放置している。もし彼が今それを満たしたいとすれば、面白い事が起きる。見ものだよ

original: Follow me. I'll take you to it.
string: ついて来い。案内しよう

original: Of course. Hasn't everyone?
string: もちろん。誰だってそうだろう？

original: No.
string: いいや

original: Don't try and impress me. It only leaves you looking foolish.
string: いいところを見せようとするな。愚かに見えるだけだ

original: I've never heard of it.
string: 聞いたことないな

original: It is a rather well-kept secret.
string: かなり厳重に守られた秘密だ

original: I have news, but I wouldn't call it good.
string: 報せはあるが、朗報とは呼びにくい

original: Of course. Why did I suppose differently. Fine, tell me what you know.
string: もちろんだ。考えてる事は同じだな。いいだろう、君が知ってる事を教えてくれ

original: Not exactly.
string: ちょっと違うな

original: Damn. Well what do you know?
string: まったく… 君は何を知ってるんだ？

original: Look at this. I should've known it was only a matter of time before they found us.
string: この有り様だよ。奴らが我々を見つけるのは時間の問題だった。それを分かっていれば…

original: It's the price we pay for openly recruiting. We'll have to step up our defenses.
string: 誰でも彼でも雇うからこういう事になるんだ。守りを固めないとまずい

original: I don't suppose you have some good news for me.
string: いい知らせは多分ないんだろうな

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: I've heard the rumors around Skyrim. I know something's going on. And I've seen the vampires.
string: 噂はスカイリム中を駆けめぐってる。何かが起きてる事は分かってるんだ。吸血鬼の姿だって何度も見てるし

original: I felt I had two choices. I could either live in fear of the night, or I could do something to help protect my people.
string: 選択肢は2つあると感じたんだ。夜に怯えて生きるか、それとも同胞を守るために立ちあがるか

original: We hunt down and kill vampires. Haven't you been paying attention?
string: 我々は吸血鬼を追い詰めて殺す。知らなかったのか？

original: In the old days, the Dawnguard kept all of Skyrim safe from those bloodsucking scum.
string: 昔はドーンガードがスカイリム全体を、あの血を吸うバケモノ達から守っていた

original: Then people stopped taking the threat seriously, the Dawnguard was disbanded, and the vampires came creeping back.
string: だが人々は奴らの脅威を軽視し始めた。そしてドーンガードは解散して、吸血鬼が再びはびこるようになったのだ

original: Now I'm trying to reestablish the Dawnguard. Take the fight to the vampires for a change. I hope it isn't too late.
string: 今私はドーンガードを復興して、吸血鬼に戦いを挑み、状況を変えようと奮闘している。手遅れでなければいいのだが

original: This is Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦だ

original: Originally owned by the Jarl of Riften back in the Second Era, it was a bit of a black mark on the Hold's history.
string: 元は第二紀の頃にリフテンの首長が所有していたものだった。要塞の歴史におけるちょっとした汚点だがな

original: I'm trying to put it to good use.
string: 私は砦を有効に利用しようとしてるんだ

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: They also have an Elder Scroll.
string: 連中は星霜の書も一巻、持っている

original: They what?
string: 奴らが何だって？

original: And you didn't stop them? You didn't secure the scroll?
string: そして君は奴らを止めなかったと？ 書を確保しなかったのか？

original: The woman was a vampire, and they wanted her back.
string: 女性は吸血鬼で、連中は彼女を奪還しようとしていた

original: And so we've delivered her right to them. I should've kept her here until we were certain...
string: 我々は彼女を連中のもとに送り込んだというわけだ。確信が持てるまで彼女をここに置いておくべきだったな…

original: Hmmm. Pull chains and traps. Be careful here. Whatever's on the other side of this, the Falmer wanted to keep there.
string: ええと。引き鎖と罠ですわね。用心なさって。向こう側にあるのが何にせよ、ファルメルが持ち出されたくなかったものですから

original: Looks like these Falmer are here to stay.
string: このファルメル達はここに住んでいたようですわね

original: They must be who that priest was calling "the Betrayed."
string: あの司祭が“裏切られし者達”と呼んでいたのは彼らの事に違いありませんわ

original: That... wasn't as unpleasant as I thought it would be.
string: あれは… 思っていたほど悪くありませんでしたわね

original: Kind of soothing, actually. I feel a little warmer, now.
string: むしろ癒されたくらいですわ。前よりも体が暖かく感じますもの

original: What's that? I can feel some kind of power from it...
string: あれは何ですの？ ある種の力を感じますわ…

original: I wonder what happened to them.
string: 彼らに一体何があったのかしら

original: These people were... why would anyone want to set up camp here?
string: この人達は… どうしてここでキャンプを張ろうとしたのかしら…

original: I'm not ready yet. Give me more time.
string: まだ準備ができていない。もっと時間がほしい

original: You are a guest in this castle at my pleasure. I'll permit you to stay for now, but you're of no use to me like this.
string: この城には私の客人として滞在してもらう。今は置いてやるが、そのままでは何の役にも立たん

original: I am ready to receive the ancient blood.
string: 古き血を授かる用意ができた

original: Good. Do not offend me by losing it again.
string: よし。再び失くすなどという無礼のないようにな

original: You have forsaken my gift. The ancient blood no longer flows through your veins. Don't deny it!
string: 我が恩恵を捨て去ったのか。古き血はもうお前の体に流れてはいない。否定しても無駄だ！

original: Count yourself fortunate that I'm a forgiving man. Now, be still while I give you the ancient blood once more.
string: 私が寛大な心の持ち主でよかったな。古き血をもう一度与えてやる。じっとしていろ…

original: If I'd known Skyrim was so dangerous, I'd have brought more guards.
string: スカイリムが危険な場所だと知ってたら、もっと守りを固めて来たのに

original: Ambushed by vampires... I certainly wasn't expecting that.
string: 吸血鬼達に待ち伏せを喰らって… 完全に予測外だったよ

original: This is all more excitement than I'm used to.
string: こんなに心みなぎるのは初めてだよ

original: Very well, then.
string: それでは

original: Divines keep you safe, my friend.
string: 神々のご加護を、友よ

original: If you find any more Elder Scrolls lying about, be sure to let me know!
string: また星霜の書を見つけたら、必ず教えてくれよ！

original: Very well, master.
string: 主様、それでは

original: I will await your return.
string: お帰りをお待ちしております

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: I have nothing more to say to you.
string: もう話す事はないよ

original: The Empire will send someone to find me. You'll see!
string: 帝国は私を探しに誰かを送り込む。そのうち分かるぞ！

original: Threaten me all you like, it won't matter.
string: 好きなだけ脅すがいい。痛くもかゆくもないぞ

original: Find that Moth Priest! I will suffer no delays!
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探せ！ 遅れは許さん！

original: Go now, and prove that my faith in you was not misplaced.
string: 行くがいい、お前を信じた私の判断が間違っていなかった事を証明して見せるのだ

original: If the Moth Priest has guards, show them no mercy.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が護衛を連れている場合、護衛には容赦するな

original: You've done well. I won't forget that.
string: よくやった。今回の功績は忘れん

original: Your obedience pleases me.
string: お前の忠誠には満足している

original: Go, then, and do not forget who is your master.
string: さあ行くがいい。くれぐれも誰が主君であるのかを忘れるなよ

original: You made a pact with Molag Bal?
string: モラグ・バルと契約を結んだのか？

original: In an age long forgotten to history, I ruled as a mighty king. My domain was vast, my riches endless and my power infinite.
string: 歴史上忘れられてしまった遥か昔、私は強大な王として君臨していた。領土は広く、富は際限なく、権力は無限とすら言えた

original: And yet, as my mortal life neared an end, I faced a seemingly invincible enemy -- my own mortality.
string: しかし、寿命の終わりが近づくと共に、私は打倒不可能と思える敵、自らの命のぜい弱性と向き合う事になったのだよ

original: I pledged myself to Molag Bal, and in his name I sacrificed a thousand innocents.
string: 私はモラグ・バルに忠誠を誓い、その名のもとに無実の者を千人、生贄として捧げた

original: In reward, he gave everlasting life to myself, my wife and my daughter. And so I have defeated mortality itself.
string: 見返りとして私と、妻と娘の三人は無限の命を授かった。そうして私は寿命にさえも打ち勝ったのだ

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: A shrine to Molag Bal, the mighty Daedra Prince who is father to all our kind.
string: 我々の同朋すべての父であるデイドラの王子、モラグ・バルをまつった祠だ

original: Our power is a blessing from him. It is he who first bestowed the gift of the ancient blood upon me.
string: この力はそのモラグ・バルからの祝福なのだ。私が最初に古き血を授かった時も、ご本人からだった

original: What happened? How did I get here?
string: 何が起こった？ どうしてここに？

original: My blood is potent. At first, the body is overwhelmed by it.
string: 私の血は強い力を宿している。最初は相手の体を圧倒してしまう

original: After my bite, you collapsed and fell into a slumber. Now your flesh has acclimated to the new blood that courses through your veins.
string: 噛まれたお前は倒れ、昏睡状態となった。そして今や、肉体が身体を巡る新たな血に順応したのだ

original: I assure you, no harm was done. In truth, your strength surprises me. Not all mortals can withstand my embrace.
string: 心配せずとも、害はない。正直なところ、お前の強靭さには驚いた。我が抱擁に耐えきれぬ定命の者もいる

original: I'm ready to learn about my new powers.
string: 新たな力について知りたい

original: With my guidance you will become a deadly instrument, striking terror in the hearts of mortals wherever you tread.
string: 私の導きのもとでお前は驚異的な存在となり、行く先々で定命の者達の心を恐怖に陥れる事だろう

original: Now, listen to my words and do as I instruct.
string: さあ、私の言葉を聞き、言う通りにするがいい

original: Awake at last, good.
string: ようやく目覚めたか

original: The power is growing within you, and now you must learn to wield it.
string: 体の中で育ちつつある力の、使い方をおぼえる必要がある

original: They used to call Windhelm, "the City of Kings." In my books, anyway.
string: ウィンドヘルムは“王の都”と呼ばれておりましたのよ。本にはそう書いてありましたわ

original: I had expected Ysgramor's city to be... bigger.
string: イスグラモルの都はもっとその… 大きいと思っていましたのよ

original: From the castle, you used to just be able to see Solitude over the mountains. It's exactly what I imagined.
string: お城からは山並みの向こうにソリチュードが見えましたのよ。あの頃に思い描いていた通りの街ですわ

original: I'd read stories about the Solitude windmill, but I didn't expect it to be that big!
string: ソリチュードの風車の事は本で読んだことがありますけれど、まさかあんなに大きいなんて！

original: What a curious city. It's so... open.
string: すこぶる面白い街ですわね。なんというかすごく… あけっぴろげですわ

original: This place makes me a little uneasy.
string: ここにいると少し落ち着かない気分になりますわね

original: These people seem nervous, which makes me nervous.
string: ここの人達はなんだか張り詰めているように見えますわ。それでわたしも気が張ってしまいますのね

original: This land feels... twisted. I'm surprised my father didn't want to live out here.
string: ここはなんだか… ゆがんだ感じがいたしますわ。父がここに住みたがらなかったのは驚きですわね

original: Rocks and valley, crevices and hiding places. This is the kind of place where hermits and fanatics dwell.
string: 岩がちな谷間と、裂け目だらけで身をひそめる場所に事欠かない地形。世捨て人や狂信者が住むにはうってつけの場所ですわね

original: I've never seen leaves this color.
string: こんな色の葉は見た事がありませんわ

original: I'm okay with the dark, but I've spent more than my share of time in caves already.
string: 暗いのは平気ですけれど、洞窟にはもう飽き飽きしておりますのよ

original: Let's move faster. The sun is... it's not great for my skin, if you know what I mean.
string: 急ぎましょう。太陽は… お肌の大敵ですのよ。分かっているとは思いますけれど

original: I was always taught to avoid these types of ruins. I think I see why, now.
string: こういう廃墟は避けるようにと教わりましたけれど、ようやく理由が分かりましたわ

original: Does the air feel... heavy down here? I'm a little woozy, but it might just be from waking up.
string: ここの空気… 重く感じませんこと？ 少し頭がぼんやりいたしますわ、寝起きだからかも知れませんけれど

original: It'll be good to get outside and breathe again. I haven't missed the sunlight, but I do miss fresh air.
string: また外に出て深呼吸できたらいいでしょうね。陽の光は恋しくなくとも、新鮮な空気は恋しいですわ

original: Nervous?
string: 落ち着きませんの？

original: You've got plenty of moths. What's our next move?
string: 蚕はたっぷり集まりましたわ。次はどうしますの？

original: Looks like we're on the right track.
string: どうやらこの方向で正しいようですわね

original: Dexion didn't really give us a lot to go on, did he?
string: デキソンは大してやる事を示してくれなかったのではなくて？

original: Well, we've got that knife. There has to be a use for it.
string: さあ、ナイフは手に入りましたわ。あとはその使い道ですわね

original: This must be the place.
string: ここに違いありませんわ

original: I hope we reach Ancestor Glade soon.
string: “先人の湿地”が近いといいのですけれど

original: It's so bright out here. I don't know how you stand it.
string: ここはひどく明るいですわね。あなたはどうして平気でいられますの？

original: This must be that beautiful Skyrim weather I've always heard about.
string: これが噂に聞くスカイリムの美しい空ですのね

original: I'm no fan of the sun, but it would be better than this.
string: 太陽は好きではありませんけれど、これよりはマシなはずですわ

original: Let's get indoors. Or in a cave. Anywhere, just out of this.
string: 建物の中に入りましょう。洞窟でも構いませんわ。とにかく陽の届かない所へ

original: Shouldn't we keep moving? I really want to get back home.
string: 先に進むべきではなくて？ 早く家に帰りたいですわ

original: It's not too far, now. At least, I don't think it is. I thought you knew the way?
string: もうそんなに遠くありませんわ。少なくともわたしの見立てでは。道は分かっておりますわよね？

original: Aren't we there yet?
string: まだ着きませんの？

original: So... this is the place.
string: すると… ここがそうですのね

original: Here we are. Ready to go in?
string: 着きましてよ。中に入る用意はよろしくて？

original: This isn't really a good time.
string: あまりいいタイミングではありませんわね

original: It's probably best for you if we're not seen together right now.
string: 今は一緒にいるところを見られない方があなたのためかも知れませんわ

original: So far this hasn't been too bad. Gets lonely exploring by myself, though.
string: これまでのところ、そんなに悪くありませんわね。独りで探索してると寂しくなりますけれど

original: Where have you been?
string: どこにおりましたの？

original: Nothing like a goose chase around the whole damned province.
string: 1つの地域をあてもなく探しまわるほど素敵な事はございませんわね

original: "The Tale of the Great Moth Priest Hunt." Not something I'd want to read.
string: 「聖蚕僧侶戦記」。わたしの趣味とは違いますわね

original: I'm a little nervous about all of this.
string: こういう事に、ちょっと神経質になっておりますの

original: So, this was my old stomping grounds. Not the most normal childhood.
string: 昔はここでよく遊びましたわ。ごく普通の子供時代とは言えませんわね

original: I'll bet my parents didn't know the half of this part of the castle.
string: 父も母も、お城のこの部分に関しては半分も知らなかったと断言できますわ

original: I promise you, it didn't always look like this.
string: 誓って言いますわ、昔はこんな風ではありませんでしたのよ

original: I miss the flowers.
string: 花が恋しいですわ

original: I'm wondering what my mother got up to, here. She definitely wasn't trying to keep the place clean.
string: 母はここで何をしていたのかしら。掃除をしていたわけではない事は確かですわね

original: Well, looks like some other guests have taken over since my mother left.
string: なるほど、母がいなくなったあとは、他のお客さんが引き継いだようですのね

original: I was hoping it wouldn't smell this bad.
string: 思っていた以上に酷い臭いですわ

original: I can't imagine living here. Or... being dead here. Or... whatever they'd call it. Ugh.
string: ここで生活を送るなんて想像できませんわ。私は生きていませんけれども… 誰がなんと言おうとお断りですわ… うぅっ

original: Let's just find my mother and get out of here.
string: すぐに母を見つけてここから出ましょう

original: The quicker we find the Keepers, the quicker we can leave.
string: 番人達が早く見つかれば、それだけ早くここを出ていけますわ

original: Do you need something?
string: 何か必要なものでも？

original: Oh, what is it?
string: あら、何ですの？

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: Yes?
string: はい？

original: Gah... let's clear out this steam so we can take a look.
string: ゴホ… この蒸気を払って、見てみようか

original: Is that... the Forge?
string: あれは… 鋳造器具？

original: Amazing...
string: すごいな…

original: That took longer than usual. How deep are we?
string: 普通より長くかかったね。どれだけ深いのかな？

original: Use the power of the ancient blood to transform into a Vampire Lord.
string: 古き血の力を使って吸血鬼の王に変身するのだ

original: Transform into the Vampire Lord, and I will teach you more.
string: 吸血鬼の王の姿になれ。さらに説明しよう

original: There is one last thing you must know. Slaying mortal men with your life drain grants you new night powers and blood magic.
string: 最後にもう一つ知っておくといい。定命の人間達の生命力を吸い取って殺せば、新たな夜の力と血の魔法が得られる

original: I keep a stable of thralls in the castle should you need to feed like the baser vampires to stave off the sun.
string: 下々の吸血鬼のように血を吸う事で日の光から身を守りたいのであれば、城に従徒を数名待機させてある

original: Good. You are weaker while on the ground, because you cannot access the blood magic.
string: 地上では血の魔法が使えないため、力が弱くなる

original: However, the night powers are still yours to command, and your claws are still formidable weapons.
string: だが夜の力はまだ使えるうえに、爪の驚異的な威力は変わらない

original: Should you run out of magicka, you can descend to the ground and fight as the beasts do.
string: マジカが尽きてしまった場合、地面に下りてけだものどもと同様に戦う事もできる

original: Do so now and we will continue.
string: 次に進む前に、試してみるといい

original: In this form, you can drain the life from your foes with your right hand.
string: この姿では右手で敵の生命力を吸い取る事ができる

original: With your left hand, you can wield the power of blood magic to raise the dead.
string: 左手では血の魔法の力を使って死者をよみがえらせる事が可能だ

original: You can also call upon the powers of night to turn into a swarm of bats and reappear some distance away.
string: また、夜の力によってコウモリの一群に姿を変え、少し離れた場所に移る事もできる

original: The true power of the ancient blood is found in the form of the Vampire Lord.
string: 古き血の真の力は、吸血鬼の王の姿となった時に発揮される

original: Assume the mantle of the Vampire Lord, and we will continue.
string: 次に進む前に、吸血鬼の王の衣を身にまとうがいい

original: Maybe your mother didn't trust you, either.
string: 母親は君自身のことも信用していなかったのかもな

original: That's always a possibility. She was almost as obsessed as my father by the time she shut me in.
string: その可能性は常にありますわね。母がわたしを閉じ込めた頃は、父とほとんど同じぐらい何かにとりつかれておりましたから

original: But I can't worry about that now. We need the scroll, and she's our only lead.
string: でも今はそんな事を心配している場合ではありませんわ。書を手に入れなくては。彼女が唯一の手掛かりなのですから

original: We can't waste time on cryptic clues.
string: 謎めいた手掛かりに割いている時間はない

original: If you have a better lead than this, I'm all ears.
string: もっといい手掛かりを持っているなら、聞いてさしあげてもよくてよ

original: Does Harkon even care about you anymore?
string: 今のハルコンは、君のことを少しでも想っているのか？

original: You know, I've asked myself the same thing.
string: 同じ内容の自問をした事がありますわよ

original: I thought... I hoped that if he saw me, he might feel something again.
string: わたしの姿を目にすれば、もう一度何かを感じてくれるかも知れないと

original: But I guess I don't really factor in at this point.
string: けれども今となってはわたしの事など、どうでもよくなっているみたいですわね

original: What is it between you two?
string: 一筋縄ではなさそうな親子関係だ

original: Ever since he decided to make that prophecy his calling, we kind of drifted apart.
string: あの予言を天命と見なして以来、疎遠になっていきましたわ

original: I don't think he even sees me as his daughter anymore. I'm just... a means to an end.
string: 父はもうわたしの事を娘とは思っておりませんわ。わたしはただの… 道具にすぎませんのよ

original: Kill the abominations!
string: 化け物どもを殺せ！

original: Praise Arkay!
